titleStmt.title: The rape of Lucrece, committed by Tarquin the sixt; and the remarkable judgments that befel him for it. / By the incomparable master of our English poetry, Will: Shakespeare gent. Whereunto is annexed, The banishment of Tarquin: or, the reward of lust. By J. Quarles.
titleStmt.author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
Quarles, John, 1624-1665. Tarquin banished: or, The reward of lust.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for John Stafford in George-yard neer Fleet-bridge, and Will: Gilbertson at the Bible in Giltspur-street,

notesStmt.note: "Tarquin banished: or, The revvard of lust" has separate dated title page; identified as E.1672[4] on Thomason Tracts.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
